targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("available_percent") * -1 + 100 FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("resp") FROM "def"."host.health" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ip", "type"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_iowait") AS "iowait" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" = 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "name" !~ /^*_usage$/ AND ("unit" = 'percent' OR "unit" = 'rpm')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "interface" =~ /^$IFACES$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_recv"), 1s) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("drop_in")) AS "in", non_negative_difference(mean("drop_out")) AS "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "interface" =~ /^$IFACES$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write", non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("write_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("writes")) AS "write", non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("reads")) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write", non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("write_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("writes")) AS "write", non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("reads")) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write", non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("write_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("writes")) AS "write", non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("reads")) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write", non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("write_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("writes")) AS "write", non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("reads")) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "name" =~ /^$DISKS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT "mb" FROM "def"."system.usage" WHERE "host" = '$HOST' AND $timeFilter AND "mb" > 1024 GROUP BY "program", "host"
SELECT "size" FROM "def"."system.disk.usage" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "path" != '/var/lib' AND "path" != '/var/log') AND $timeFilter AND "size" > 100000 GROUP BY "path", "host"

list.label: Host
list.name: HOST
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE role = 'cube'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" = '$HOST'
list.label: Interface(s)
list.name: IFACES
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" = '$HOST'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" = '$HOST'
list.label: Disk(s)
list.name: DISKS
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" = '$HOST'
